abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Transport
            Rehabilitation Project is to assist the Government of Serbia
            in reducing cost and improving safety for road users
            through: (a) improving the condition of selected road
            sections of the main and regional road network; (b)
            improving the effectiveness of road maintenance through the
            introduction of performance-based contracting in two pilot
            regions; and (c) introducing safe road design principles,
            road safety audits, and targeted improvement measures. A
            retroactive increase in the disbursement percentages for
            categories works, goods, and consultants services in
            schedule one, part two of the credit agreement from 91
            percent, 90 percent and 80 percent respectively to 100
            percent for all eligible payments. This change is to be
            introduced for all eligible payments for the years 2009,
            2010, and 2011. The disbursement percentages are completely
            within the approved country financing parameters for Serbia.
